name: Hire me, Senpai!
description:
"Hire me, Senpai - 私を雇って、先輩!" is a fun/mock job interview, inspired by Japanese visual novels, developed during the Winter UE4 Game Jam 2018.

A game of choice and cunning! 

The player plays the role of a newly graduate attending a job interview, hoping to find his dream job... But the interviewer will not be easy to impress!

Are you going to impress the Interviewer?

A game by
Vicky Seven Design (http://www.vickyseven.com)
D'Ack Games (https://www.dackgames.com/)
Cinzia Draws (https://www.facebook.com/Cinzia-draws-1536320543329588/)
